entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts. He is described as sitting down with other Gryffindors and wondering about Professor Karkaroff's whereabouts.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who has a fear of attack due to his ten-month imprisonment in his own trunk. He is mentioned as being bound to have had an increased fear of attack.

entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts whose chair was empty. Harry wonders where he is and whether Voldemort has caught up with him.

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is still present and sitting next to Hagrid. She is mentioned as talking quietly together with him.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper at Hogwarts who is sitting next to Madame Maxime and talking quietly with her.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts whose eyes lingered on Harry for a moment. His expression was difficult to read.

entities.name: volde-mort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story who is mentioned as having returned and possibly caught up with Professor Karkaroff.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts whose orders Snape followed on the night Voldemort returned. His name is mentioned in relation to Snape's actions.

relationships.description: Harry continued to watch Snape, long after he had looked away.
Harry wonders whether Voldemort has caught up with Professor Karkaroff.
Snape followed Dumbledore's orders on the night Voldemort returned.
